meanings.definition: An object used to hold down papers on a desk.
meanings.sent1: I placed the paperweights on my papers to keep them from flying around.
meanings.sent2: The heavy paperweights kept my important documents secure on the desk.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous breeze tried to play with the paperweights, but they stood their ground.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a stack of paperweights, keeping her focused on her work.
meanings.sent5: The shiny paperweights gleamed under the sunlight, adding elegance to the desk.

meanings.definition: A decorative item placed on top of papers to prevent them from blowing away.
meanings.sent1: The glass paperweights added a touch of beauty to the scattered papers.
meanings.sent2: She collected unique paperweights to adorn her workspace.
meanings.sent3: The paperweights whispered secrets to the papers beneath them.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was like a paperweight, anchoring her heart in place.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the paperweights mesmerized anyone who passed by.
